long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Discover the power of seamless currency conversion with the BTC Converter! This lightweight and easy-to-use Chrome extension automatically detects USD values on web pages and displays the corresponding Bitcoin value in a handy tooltip when you hover over the amount.

Features:
- Auto-detection of USD values within web pages
- Instant conversion to Bitcoin using real-time exchange rates
- No need to copy-paste or manually enter values - just hover to convert
- Elegant and unobtrusive tooltip design that complements any website style

How to use:
1. Install the extension and see it work automatically as you browse the web.
2. Hover over any USD amount on a webpage, and a tooltip will appear displaying the equivalent Bitcoin value.
3. Move your cursor away from the USD value, and the tooltip will disappear.

Save time and effort while staying informed about the latest exchange rates with the BTC Converter. Install now and enjoy effortless currency conversion at your fingertips!

Roadmap:

We're always working to improve the BTC Converter and make it even more useful for our users. Here's what's coming up in future updates:

1. Support for more currencies: We'll be adding support for additional fiat and cryptocurrencies, allowing you to convert multiple currency values on-the-fly.

2. Customizable tooltip appearance: Personalize the look and feel of the tooltip to match your browsing preferences, with options for themes, colors, and font styles.

We're excited to bring these enhancements and more to the BTC Converter. Stay tuned for updates, and thank you for your support!

Privacy:

This extension only accesses and modifies the content of the web pages for the sole purpose of providing currency conversion. It does not collect, store, or transmit any personal data or browsing history. Privacy and security are of paramount importance.
